content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear Colleague,\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As you know, keeping good health is one of the pre-requisites for productive work, wellness, and happiness, especially nowadays.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In compliance with established in article 22 of Act 31/1995 on Occupational Health and Safety in Spain, EPAM offers all team members a short\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" annual medical check-up\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in order to prevent potential health risks linked to your professional role.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Let me tell you a few things about it:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This medical check-up is completely \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"voluntary and will be offered again periodically\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", so that you can decide whether to undergo it on more occasions, without any consequences.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This is a basic medical check-up oriented to know your medical fitness for your job. Please note this does not replace the annual medical check recommended by doctors and has nothing to do with other health related benefits or medical insurance that EPAM offers you.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It will be carried out by specialists in occupational medicine and will consist of a physical examination, and analysis of blood, blood pressure, etc., following the legal standards in occupational health.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A confidential report of main health indicators will be share with you shortly afterwards and EPAM’s Health & Safety Service will receive a declaration of fitness for work only, not specific/personal details.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the case of Malaga, the medical examination will be carried out in a clinic in the city center. In case there are employees interested in other provinces, arrangements will be made with local clinics.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is important that you \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"let us know if you are interested but also if you are not\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" as we need to organize the appointments, so please fill out the Questionnaire on the next page with your Spanish ID (DNI or NIE) and choose whether you want to undergo the medical check-up or not.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you decide yes, during the next 12 months you will be contacted to make the appointment and give you the necessary instructions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We hope this information is clear enough but in case you have any questions, please contact H&S Service at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAEHSES@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAEHSES@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thank you very much and stay healthy!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Health & Safety Service\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
